title: My password was asked to be changed without me asking?
body: In my email it said my password was asked to be changed at 1:14am even though I never asked? I ended up changing my password after finding this out and I still have my account and log into it but I'm just worried this was an account theft attempt?

replies.body:
That sounds pretty spooky, I suggest running through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help secure your info in and outside of game.

If you have any issues with recovery, rest easy knowing we can help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
